item.description:
Hopkington State Park is less than an hours drive from Boston. It includes the picturesque Hopkinton Reservoir and contains 1450 acres and 10 miles of marked trails.  

Park Directions Rte. I-495 (north or south) to exit 21A, Main Street Hopkinton. Travel on Main Street until the third traffic light located at the heart of downtown Hopkinton. Turn left, traveling North on Route 85. Proceed approximately 2 miles to the Hopkinton State Park entrance on the right (do not enter the Field Office on the left). Meet in the parking lot by the beach.

Lunch after the walk at Stone's Public House, 170 Main St Ashland.

http://www.stonespublichouse.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot by the beach.
item.name: Hopkinton State Park
